Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $12000. I trust this price reflects not only the product's value but also the opportunity for you to gain from its use. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of providing such an outstanding product to someone as discerning as yourself. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
